item.description:
Learn about past lives, dreams, Soul Travel and more.

For me, Eckankar is a very individual path, allowing me the freedom to behold God in my own way. Yet it has also been wonderful to enjoy the company of so many others who have also had extraordinary spiritual experiences, and who know you're not "crazy" to have them--but blessed.

The workshop will cover the basic beliefs and practices of this modern teaching that is based on ancient principles. We'll also walk you though exercises to help you explore your own inner worlds.

You can learn more about Eckankar, Religion of the Light and Sound of God at www.eckankar.org.

Workshop time: 10AM to 11:30AM.

Feel welcome to bring a friend!
item.how_to_find_us: Through front door and straight down hallway, room is to the right.

group.name: The Central Connecticut Spiritual Experiences Group

item.name: An Introduction to Eckankar: Principles and Practices for Spiritual Awakening
